attributes.action: ban prison criminal offenders profiting from their crimes selling stories-give it to the victims or families, and allow permit armed forces service men/women to sell their stories and keep the profit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: crime is not supposed to pay, but in the uk it does. crazy eh? ban prison inmates criminals offenders making good money by selling their stories because victims end up worst off. (make the profits go to the victims or families) and allow our armed forces members service men and women to sell their stories, as it is they who deserve to profit from it more than the prisoners and criminals do.   thank you.
